channel.title: Strings on Kode Kaavalan
channel.description: Recent content in Strings on Kode Kaavalan

item.title: KMP
item.description: ​ Python Java C++ def compute_prefix(pattern): m = len(pattern) pi = [0] * m j = 0 for i in range(1, m): while j > 0 and pattern[i] != pattern[j]: j = pi[j - 1] if pattern[i] == pattern[j]: j += 1 pi[i] = j return pi def KMP(text, pattern): n, m = len(text), len(pattern) pi = compute_prefix(pattern) j = 0 for i in range(n): while j > 0 and text[i] !
